titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the Eritrean subject collection, 1940-2015
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Issayas Tesfamariam

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2015-08-06T10:46-0700

change.item: Revised to update encoding and add unitid.
PUBLIC "-//Stanford University::Hoover Institution Archives//TEXT (US::CSt-H::::Eritrean Subject Collection)//EN" "reg_237.sgm" converted from EAD 1.0 to 2002 by v1to02.cdl.xsl (2004-09-16).

did.unittitle: Eritrean subject collection

physdesc.extent: 4 manuscript boxes, 2 oversize boxes, 1 sound disc

did.abstract: Bulletins, pamphlets, press releases, speeches, printed matter, memorabilia, video tape, and sound recording relating to drought and famine in Eritrea, the independence movement led by the Eritrean People's Liberation Front, the establishment of Eritrean independence in 1993, and political, social, and economic conditions in Eritrea.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Eritrean subject collection, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Bulletins, pamphlets, press releases, speeches, printed matter, memorabilia, video tape, and sound recording relating to drought and famine in Eritrea, the independence movement led by the Eritrean People's Liberation Front, the establishment of Eritrean independence in 1993, and political, social, and economic conditions in Eritrea.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
